alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 9:27PM CDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Clarke, Wilcox and Monroe Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From late Friday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 40 feet, considerable flooding of agricultural land. At 42 feet, Water begins to inundate Eureka Landing community. At 43 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 29.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning and continue rising to 45.8 feet Sunday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 42 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
